Pre-Game Insights: The Lakers are sitting at 3-1, while the Cavaliers are undefeated at 4-0.
LeBron James and Bronny James are playing a homecoming game for the Cavaliers.
The Cavaliers are a 4.5-point favorite as of Wednesday morning.
The total is set at 225 points for the Lakers-Cavaliers game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: FanDuel Sportsbook has a promotion for ALL customers, offering TWO Profit Boost Tokens (each 50%) for NBA games taking place on October 30th, 2024.
The promotion includes a 50% Profit Boost Token for a 3+ leg Same Game Parlay / Same Game Parlay Plus wager and another for a 2+ leg 'To Record a Double-Double' SGP/SGP+/Parlay wager.
Others: The promotion is only open to individuals who are at least 21 years of age (18+ in D.C.) and are physically present in select states.
The promotion will end at 2:00 AM ET on October 31, 2024.
